Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: This week's news has been buzzing with some of the biggest announcements from the Federal Government ahead of next week's budget release. People have been talking about the prospect of a world-first vaping ban the introduction of a new emergency messaging system and the possibility of a boost to JobSeeker payments. Meanwhile others speculate the proposed changes to the Australian Defence Force aiming to encourage members to remain in service. It will be interesting to see how these budget proposals and reforms will be received by the public.
